cab.content: Mr C.lo/ghurst.(This Document is the Property of His Britannic Majesty1s GovernmentWAS 0ABIM1T,S ORDT.G.T. 8373. WATLK PO.a.3 bill.Memorandum by the President of the' Board of Agriculture and Fisheries.With reference to G.T. 7948 and the draft Water Power 3ill circulated to the Cabinet by the President of the Board of Trade, I desire to call attention to the fact that Water power Schemes frequently involve river dams and that their erection is a serious factor in Salmon Fishery Conservancy and I may have proposals to secure the position oi tho Board of Agriculture and fisheries on this subject.1 of F.iSlst October. 1919
